synopsis.text: Based on the classic 1888 Jules Verne novel 'Two Years' Vacation', this animated film follows the thrilling journey of a group of 15 young feline adventurers who find themselves stranded on a deserted island after a treacherous storm at sea. In this reimagined adaptation, the original human characters are replaced with cats, providing a fresh and modern twist while staying true to the spirit of the original story. The young cats must learn to cooperate and rely on each other in order to survive in this unfamiliar and challenging environment, making for an exciting and heartwarming tale of friendship and resilience. Directed by the late Ryuutarou Nakamura, this film promises to be a visually stunning and emotionally engaging experience for both cat lovers and adventure enthusiasts alike.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
